text: A Nest of Gentry () is a 1969 Soviet drama movie directed by Andrey Konchalovsky.В Воронеже откроют памятную доску композитору, чья музыка звучит в фильмах Бондарчука, Тарковского и КончаловскогоДВОРЯНСКОЕ ГНЕЗДО (1969) It stars Irina Kupchenko, Leonid Kulagin, and Beata Tyszkiewicz. == Actors == * Irina Kupchenko as Liza * Leonid Kulagin as Lavretsky * Beata Tyszkiewicz as Varvara Pavlovna * Tamara Chernova as Maria Dmitriyevna * Viktor Sergachyov as Panshin * Vasili Merkuryev as Gedeonovsky == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1969 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: A Nest of Gentry (movie)
